about_the_game:
Camelot: Home of King Arthur’s court… and intrigue!

Tall Tale Games invites you into medieval world of King Arthur, Merlin, and the courts of Camelot!

Dark clouds hover over King Arthur’s mystical kingdom and Camelot. When the Lady of the Lake goes missing, her husband the Green Knight blames King Arthur, threatening the peace of Camelot for all…

As Merlin’s apprentice, you are charged with proving that King Arthur was not to blame, and hopefully finding the real culprit behind this dastardly kidnapping and finding the Lady of the Lake to return her to the Green Knight.

It is time for you to prove your worth to Merlin and the whole court of Camelot! Will you be able to prevent war and find the traitor who plotted to bring down the King?

Special Collector’s Edition release with exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

Featuring:
• Over 60 unique scenes
• More than 45 hidden object puzzles
• Over 55 mini-games and puzzles
• Additional story and HOPA Scenes
• 65 Collectibles and Morphs to find
• Wallpapers, Music Tracks and more
• 10 extra Scenes, 8 extra HOPAs, 18 extra Puzzle/mini-games than the Standard Version
detailed_description:
Camelot: Home of King Arthur’s court… and intrigue!

Tall Tale Games invites you into medieval world of King Arthur, Merlin, and the courts of Camelot!

Dark clouds hover over King Arthur’s mystical kingdom and Camelot. When the Lady of the Lake goes missing, her husband the Green Knight blames King Arthur, threatening the peace of Camelot for all…

As Merlin’s apprentice, you are charged with proving that King Arthur was not to blame, and hopefully finding the real culprit behind this dastardly kidnapping and finding the Lady of the Lake to return her to the Green Knight.

It is time for you to prove your worth to Merlin and the whole court of Camelot! Will you be able to prevent war and find the traitor who plotted to bring down the King?

Special Collector’s Edition release with exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

Featuring:
• Over 60 unique scenes
• More than 45 hidden object puzzles
• Over 55 mini-games and puzzles
• Additional story and HOPA Scenes
• 65 Collectibles and Morphs to find
• Wallpapers, Music Tracks and more
• 10 extra Scenes, 8 extra HOPAs, 18 extra Puzzle/mini-games than the Standard Version

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10 El Capitan or Higher
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 12 Catalina or Higher
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.5G or Higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.5G or Higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: And GFX Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
